panelText.text: At the hospital, the doctors have an unexpected concern about his wife’s health that is, thankfully, resolved. While Jian is talking to the doctor, he leaves his laptop unattended and it disappears – with the supplier spreadsheet open.

When he returns to work, he informs his manager, who immediately informs the company privacy officer. Because the data was not encrypted, the company informs the affected suppliers about the situation.

Some suppliers and several large customers who heard rumors of the breach contact executive management demanding a review of the controls in place to safeguard their data. A few customers request an audit and place orders on hold until they are satisfied with the audit results.
